select t.task_no , t.subject , c.cust_no , (select cust_name from tb_cust where cust_no = c.cust_no ) as cust_name , (select phone_no from tb_cust_phone where phone_no = p.phone_no) as phone_no , (select emp_name from tb_emp where emp_no = e.emp_no) as emp_no , t.next_day , (select code_name from tb_code where code_no = '1008' and code = dtype_cd) as dtype_cd , date_format(t.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as create_date
from tb_task t left join tb_cust c on t.cust_no = c.cust_no left join tb_cust_phone p on t.cust_no = p.cust_no left join tb_emp e on t.emp_no = e.emp_no
SELECT code_name, code FROM tb_code WHERE code_no = '1008'
SELECT code_name, code FROM tb_code WHERE code_no = '1009'
SELECT IF(SUBSTR(MAX(task_no), 1, 10) = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H'), MAX(oppty_no)+1, concat(DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H'),'00001')) task_no FROM tb_task USE INDEX(PRIMARY)

select t.task_no , t.subject , (select cust_name from tb_cust where cust_no = c.cust_no ) as cust_name , (select emp_name from tb_emp where emp_no = e.emp_no) as emp_no , t.next_day , (select code_name from tb_code where code_no = '1008' and code = dtype_cd) as dtype_cd , t.lead_no , t.oppty_no , (select code_name from tb_code where code_no = '1009' and code = score_cd) as score_cd , t.location , t.remark_cn from tb_task t left join tb_cust c on t.cust_no = c.cust_no left join tb_cust_phone p on t.cust_no = p.cust_no left join tb_emp e on t.emp_no = e.emp_no;
